file_name: SightLife Surgical, Inc. - STRATEGIC SALES _ MARKETING AGREEMENT.txt

perturbation.original_text: THIS STRATEGIC SALES & MARKETING AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is effective as of the last date provided for on the signature page and is entered into by and between SightLife Surgical, Inc., a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at 1200 6th Ave, Ste. 300, Seattle, WA 98101 ("Surgical") and Imprimis Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and its subsidiaries, having its principal place of business at 12264 El Camino Real, Suite 350, San Diego, CA 92130 ("Imprimis").
perturbation.changed_text: THIS STRATEGIC SALES & MARKETING AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is effective as of the last date provided for on the signature page and is entered into by and between SightLife Surgical, Inc., a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at 1200 6th Ave, Ste. 300, Seattle, WA 98101 ("Surgical Firm") and Imprimis Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and its subsidiaries, having its principal place of business at 12264 El Camino Real, Suite 350, San Diego, CA 92130 ("Imprimis").
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Surgical' to 'Surgical Firm' creates confusion about which entity is bound by the agreement. Later references to 'Surgical' might not clearly apply to 'Surgical Firm', potentially impacting enforceability.

perturbation.original_text: In consideration of the Services provided hereunder, Imprimis shall pay Surgical sales commissions ("Sales Commissions") as set forth in the SOW. Surgical shall be responsible for all expenses incurred in association with performance of the Services.
perturbation.changed_text: In consideration of the Services provided hereunder, Imprimis shall pay Sales Representatives sales commissions ("Sales Commissions") as set forth in the SOW. Surgical shall be responsible for all expenses incurred in association with performance of the Services.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Surgical' to 'Sales Representatives' introduces uncertainty about who receives the sales commissions directly. It's unclear if 'Sales Representatives' are distinct from 'Surgical', and it raises questions about the contractual obligations of Surgical to pay Sales Representatives.

perturbation.original_text: The Sales Team shall have specific and sufficient related ophthalmic experience and relationships with potential purchasers  of the Product to adequately provide the Services.
perturbation.changed_text: The Sales Associates shall have specific and sufficient related ophthalmic experience and relationships with potential purchasers  of the Product to adequately provide the Services.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Sales Team' to 'Sales Associates' creates ambiguity regarding the composition and responsibilities of the sales force. Are 'Sales Associates' the same as 'Sales Team' mentioned elsewhere? This could affect the interpretation of performance metrics and obligations associated with the sales force.
